Title: Authorizes county boards of elections to establish county-wide polling places
Summary: Authorizes county boards of elections to establish county-wide polling places where any person entitled to vote in such county by personal appearance may so vote on the day of a primary election or general election, subject to approval by the state board of elections.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to authorizing county boards of elections to establish county-wide polling places
